headline: Stock Of The Day: Hot Footwear, Apparel Play Laps Nike, Scales New Buy Point
summary: Amer Sports is Tuesday's IBD Stock Of The Day.  The sporting goods company with long-familiar brands Wilson, Salomon and Louisville Slugger has turned into a hot footwear and apparel play.  AS stock has more than tripled from its February 2024 IPO price, running circles around Nike stock, as well as shares of On Holding and Deckers Outdoor.

raw.headline: Stock Of The Day: Hot Footwear, Apparel Play Laps Nike, Scales New Buy Point

AS stock has more than tripled from its February 2024 IPO price, running circles around Nike stock, as well as shares of On Holding and Deckers Outdoor.

headline: Amer Sports, IBD Stock Of The Day, Scales New Buy Point With Hot Footwear, Apparel
summary: Amer Sports is Tuesday's IBD Stock Of The Day.  The sporting goods company with long-familiar brands Wilson, Salomon and Louisville Slugger has turned into a hot footwear and apparel play.  "We are very confident that our fundamental business momentum, diverse global footprint, clean balance sheet and strong brand portfolio with pricing power will give us significant flexibility to manage through a variety of tariff scenarios," Chief Financial Officer Andrew Page said on the Aug. 19 earnings call.

headline: Struggling Puma sees stock surge on reports of potential sale
summary: Despite sharp declines and mounting pressure, news of a potential sale sends Puma's shares soaring.

raw.headline: Struggling Puma sees stock surge on reports of potential sale

headline: How Nike's Trail Running Launch and Push in China Could Shape the NKE Investment Narrative
summary: Nike, through its outdoor sub-brand ACG, recently launched a new trail running shoe at the Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc ultramarathon in France, with plans for public release next spring. This move reflects Nike's intent to become a standout in the outdoor recreation market and address shifting consumer interests, particularly targeting China's expanding trail running community. We'll examine how Nike's push into trail running and efforts to regain ground in China may influence its investment...
